Message:
Ever since the thundercloud
covered the sky,
everyday’s been filled
with bangs and booms...

It’s gotten so loud
around here lately.

At this rate, no one’s gonna
be able to get a good rest.

I did hear that the lord of
a country is traveling around
dispelling Curses.

If I go with him,
there’s bound to be
something I can do to help.

I mean, I’m probably the
only gravekeeping witch
out there, right?

There’s no need to worry—
Laila’s with me.

When I get back,
I’ll tell you guys
all about my adventures!
